parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to be returned in a call. You can use this parameter and NextToken to implement paging. A maximum of 100 entries can be returned in a call.

parameters.name: NamePrefix
parameters.description: The name of the event stream that you want to query.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If you configure Limit and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned.

parameters.name: SinkArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the event target.

parameters.name: SourceArn
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the event source.
